Title: Astral Kitty
Description:
Ever wanted to become the deadly Astral Tabby? Now you can! Er, well, be a fledgling one, anyway.

Also included is Barnabus, a lovely genderqueer pet who uses different pronouns every playthrough and will phase into reality to purr against your leg!

If the mod ever creates a save incompatibility, you can find specific releases here and override the Steam Workshop version:

https://github.com/vahnj/CavesOfQudAstralKitty

Other contributor: TBExtent
